description:
Only one downside, I only learned that double-clicking would activate the demote for each section by chance, perhaps it's a good idea to have that on a button (or menu option, or tab) somewhere so that people click it.

Other than that, nice app, well done, thanks a million
summary: Brilliant APP, shows what GTK means !

description: There are some very informative demos here, and some are quite fun to play around with. Overally very useful app!
summary: Works great as expected on Ubuntu 21.04 with gnome 40

description: Diverse Programmbeispiele mit Sourcecode zum direkten Ausführen in einem Programm. Leider sind sie nur nur in C geschrieben. Vielleicht kommen wir vielleicht mal von "C first" weg... wird wohl aber noch noch ein bisschen dauern :-)
